elementSpec.desc: contains the date of a document, as given (usually) on a title page.

attDef.desc: gives the value of the date in a standard form, generally YYYY-MM-DD.
attDef.valDesc: a date in one of the fomrats specified in XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition

remarks.p: For simple dates, the value should give the Gregorian or proleptic Gregorian date in the form (YYYY-MM-DD) specified by XML Schema Part 2.

Cf. the general date element in the core tag set. This specialized element is provided for convenience in marking and processing the date of the documents, since it is likely to require specialized handling for many applications.
